description.value:
Trigger A lookout identifies a threat

Effect Hura takes the gunner position. The particle cannon rolls initiative.

details.description: A glowering purple eye opens in the ship's hull. The triple barrels of a massive turret spin inside the revealed port, then release a beam of concentrated particles with ruthless efficiency.
details.disable: @Check[crafting|dc:14] (trained) or @Check[thievery|dc:14] (trained) to disable or jam the particle cannon, @Check[arcana|dc:17], @Check[occultism|dc:17], @Check[nature|dc:17], or @Check[religion|dc:17] (trained) to counteract the particle beam by exploiting a magical theory or praying for a miraculous malfunction.

publication.title: Starfinder Murder in Metal City Deluxe Adventure

details.reset: If disabled, the cannon is inactive for 1 round while Hura troubleshoots the issue, then it resumes firing. Hura stops firing if the lookouts are killed or the cannon is disabled three or more times.
details.routine: (2 actions) Hura fires a charged shot from the particle cannon, dealing @Damage[(1d6+3)[fire]|options:area-damage] damage to each creature in a @Template[type:line|distance:90] (@Check[reflex|dc:14|basic] save).
